name: Hershey's® Pumpkin Spice Kiss Pretzels
author: Jane
summary: These are cute and festive for Halloween. I made them for a work Halloween party and they were a big hit. The blend of sweet and salty is always a favorite.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) bag pumpkin spice-flavored candies (such as Hershey's® Pumpkin Spice Kisses), unwrapped
directions: Preheat oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Place 62 pretzels on the prepared baking sheet
Place 1 pumpkin spice-flavored candy on each pretzel
Place in preheated oven until candies are slightly softened, 4 to 5 minutes
Remove baking sheet from oven and immediately top each with another pretzel, lightly pressing down
Cool to room temperature on the baking sheet
